goal.title: HARDEN
goal.text: Implement security baselines using our Ansible, Chef, and Terraform content

goal.title: VALIDATE
goal.text: Generate detailed security testing results throughout the lifecycle of a system

goal.title: NORMALIZE
goal.text: Convert security results from all your security tools into a common data format

goal.title: VISUALIZE
goal.text: Identify overall security status and deep-dive to solve specific security defects
